sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Grain Coloring Act.

sections.heading: No person shall subject, or cause to be subjected, any barley,
sections.text:
wheat or other grain to fumigation, by sulphur, or other material, or to
any chemical or coloring process, whereby the color, quality or germ of
such grain is affected.

sections.heading: No person shall offer for sale, or procure to be sold, any barley,
sections.text:
wheat, or other grain that has been subjected to fumigation, or other process,
as provided in Section 1
of this Act, knowing such barley, wheat, or other grain to have been so
subjected.

sections.heading: Any person violating the provisions of this act, shall be guilty of a
sections.text:
Class B misdemeanor, and shall also be liable for all damages sustained by
any person injured by such violation.
